INPUT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER: Please enter text. Use Enter key to fill in blank lines.
TOAST_TRAILING_BLANKS_REMOVED: Spaces have been removed at the end.
TOAST_QR_CODE_DELETED_AFTER_INPUT_CHANGE: QR code deleted due to input change.
KEYBOARD_ALERT_MESSAGE:
On this device, longer texts are difficult to edit because the keyboard covers the input field.

Recommendations:
• Use this mobile app only for SHORT texts
• For LONGER texts: Use the web version on a tablet or PC
• Try enabling floating keyboard (see help section)
WORKFLOW_STEP_ENTER_TEXT: Next step: Enter text or email address
WORKFLOW_STEP_MAIL_AGAIN: Next step: Mail again or change/clear input
TOOLTIP_GENERATION_ENTER_TEXT_FIRST: Please enter text before generating QR code
TOOLTIP_GENERATION_EMAIL_ALREADY_SENT: Email was already sent. Please clear or modify the input field for new QR code
TOOLTIP_GENERATION_QR_ALREADY_GENERATED: QR code was already generated. Please clear or modify the input field for new QR code
TOOLTIP_EMAIL_INVALID_ADDRESS: Please enter a valid email address
TOOLTIP_NAVIGATION_CLEAR_TEXT_TO_SWITCH: Please clear the text field before switching to email maintenance
CLEAR_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: This will clear all entered text. Continue?
EMAIL_PAGE_INFOTEXT: These saved email addresses will be pre-filled as recipients when sending QR codes.
EMAIL_PAGE_NO_EMAIL_ADRESSES: No email addresses have been recorded yet.
EMAIL_SERVICE_MAIL_SUBJECT_PREFIX: Generated z-control QR Code of your text with
EMAIL_SERVICE_MAIL_BODY_PREFIX: This text is contained in the QR code:
EMAIL_SERVICE_MAIL_BODY_PREFIX_WEB: Note: If the QR code contains leading spaces, they may not be displayed when opening the email, as leading spaces are automatically removed by the browser when using the mailto link.
EMAIL_SERVICE_MAIL_BODY_PRINTING_INFO:
PRINTING INSTRUCTIONS:
The attached PDF prints a large QR code (almost full A4 width). For different sizes or detailed printing instructions, see the 'How to print QR Code in a specific size?' section in the app's help page (? icon).

Quick tip: For optimal scanning, QR codes should be at least 2.5 cm x 2.5 cm. Use 'Actual Size' scaling when printing.
MOBILE_WEB_EMAIL_MESSAGE: On mobile web browsers, email clients may not open automatically. Choose an option:
MOBILE_WEB_MANUAL_MESSAGE:
1. Copy the QR code text below
2. Open your email app manually
3. Create a new email with your recipients
4. Paste the text and attach the downloaded QR code images

The QR code files have been saved to your Downloads folder.
MOBILE_WEB_COPY_SUCCESS: QR code text copied to clipboard!
MOBILE_WEB_COPY_ERROR: Failed to copy text. Please select and copy manually.
ERROR_MESSAGE_SAVE_QR_SUBHEADER: Please enable storage permissions in Settings → Apps → z-control QR Code Generator → Permissions → Storage.
ERROR_MESSAGE_SAVE_QR_MESSAGE: See our user guide FAQ for detailed help.
ERROR_MESSAGE_EMAIL_WORKFLOW: Error processing email. Please try again.
INFO_ALERT_TITLE_MAIL_ATTACHMENT: Attach the QR codes to the email and delete these files when you no longer need them!
INFO_ALERT_MESSAGE_MAIL_ATTACHMENT: Due to browser restrictions, files cannot be attached to emails automatically on the web. Please manually attach the two downloaded files from your Downloads folder to your email. You can find the Downloads folder in your browser settings. Automatic attachment and deletion of files is only possible on mobile devices.
